The kingdom of Aldora. Three years after the Shadow War.
The border now runs silent â€” no scouts, no signals.

lines.speaker: kael
lines.text: Serra. We move at dawn. The border scouts haven't reported back.

lines.speaker: serra
lines.text: This silence... it's not natural. Something is blocking communications.
How do you want to proceed?

branch_aggressive.speaker: kael
branch_aggressive.text: We can't afford to wait. Every hour we delay, more lives are at risk.

branch_cautious.speaker: kael
branch_cautious.text: You're right. Rushing in blind would be reckless. We hold and gather intel.
